title: Runaway Lover - Novel Updates
author: 青丝先生
description:
Xu Mo’s career is not good, he is the underground lover of the financial president of H City, or because he looks like the white moonlight in the president’s heart, he came to be a stand-in. So when the main lord Bai Yueguang (White Moonlight) came back, he had to pack up and leave. The main lord has come back, how embarrassing that he is here as a substitute! Although President Qin didn’t let him go, Xu Mo secretly escaped…

After a while, he felt dizzy and nauseous. Xu Mo went to a private clinic for an examination, but the doctor said he was pregnant.

Xu Mo: “Doctor, are you confused? I’m a man, how can I get pregnant?” Doctor: “Young people now! You need to do it in moderation, it’s been three months, take it easy…”

Xu Mo: “ …”>
